title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Skills: Deep Learning-Based Data Augmentation for Underwater Acoustic Signal Classification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The physical characteristics of underwater acoustic signals and their classification applications can be explained.
A pipeline can be built to augment real acoustic data using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs).
A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) can be designed to classify augmented ship acoustic signals with over 80% accuracy.
Calculate performance metrics for signal classification (accuracy, precision, recall) and interpret the results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
